topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55971020636872167f0006ea#post_55971020636872167f0006ea
That's VOTOMS.

!http://www.anime-planet.com/images/anime/covers/taiyou-no-kiba-dougram-3513.jpg!
This is Dougram.

In VOTOMS, The Mecha skate around on treads on the soles of their feet, They have limited ammo, And they can be taken out by a well placed gunshot.

Dougram is more important as a political symbol.
